DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the trial is to evaluate the efficacy of two dosing schedules of Avanz SQ+ (Standardised Quality) Phleum pratense compared to placebo in subjects with grass pollen induced allergic rhinoconjunctivitis with or without asthma.
DOC.criteria: A history of grass pollen allergy Positive skin prick test to grass Positive Immunoglobulin E test to grass Other allergies overlapping the grass pollen season Severe Asthma (defined as a Forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1) below 70 % after adequate treatment)
